text.tspan: User interaction -> discovery or manual enqueue

svg.text: store accessToken in memory/localStorage (not refresh cookie)
INSERT sender_queue entries for new payloads
Render queue table, show processing status and last run
POST payload to external endpoint (HTTP request)
websocket/long-poll/polling -> notify UI about status changes
show success or errors in UI (toast, table row state)
when 401 received, call POST /api/auth/refresh with cookie (HttpOnly handled by browser)
revoke old, insert rotated refresh token
retry original request with new accessToken
may return URLs, payload ids, timestamps used to dedupe
admin endpoints return audit logs if requested
